Explanations about Options.-R(C): If that returns the proper directories, run  .  "find ./application/ -type d -not -name config -not -name logs -exec rm -R {} \;". The "exec rm -R {} \;" at the end removes the directory even if it is not empty.
Explanations about Options.-R(M): remove directories and their contents recursively
Explanations about Options.-f(M): ignore nonexistent files and arguments, never prompt
Explanations about Options.-r(M): remove directories and their contents recursively
